title: Google Assistant not able to take pictures after the August security patch, it just opens the camera
content: Google Assistant just opens the camera app and not able to click pictures after the August security patch. Tried all ways of troubleshooting- resetting, clearing cache, safe mode etc but issue persists. spoke to Google support and sent an feedback, lets wait to hear from them. Meanwhile anybody else facing this issue?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
